properties.areaDesc: Northwest Randolph; Upshur; Southeast Randolph; Barbour; Braxton
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 1:36AM EST until January 7 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Braxton, Upshur, Barbour, Northwest Randolph and
Southeast Randolph Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally heavy bands of snow can create
accumulations on roads, along with very low visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Additional information can be found at
https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and
Twitter pages.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
